Title: Bulgaria’s Bulgargaz seeks 500 GWh of LNG for delivery in April in Turkey or Greece
Description: Bulgaria’s national gas supplier Bulgargaz launched a tender for the delivery of 500 GWh of LNG on a deliver ex-ship (DES) basis in April at one of the Turkish terminals or Greece’s Revithoussa terminal. The company’s reliance on LNG increased sharply since it was cut off from Russian pipeline supplies in late April 2022.
Author: DE

Title: First sendout from Germany’s Brunsbuttel LNG terminal delayed until early March
Description: Germany’s Brunsbuttel LNG terminal is facing further delays with sendout now expected to start in early March as opposed to late February. This is the third floating terminal launched in Germany to help the country replace the lost Russian pipeline supplies as soon as possible.
Author: DE

Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks 10 LNG cargoes for delivery between May and September
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued a tender to buy ten LNG cargoes for delivery between May and September to the 11.5 mtpa Map Ta Phut LNG import terminal. The tender closes on Mar .1
Author: CK

Title: Angola LNG offers one LNG cargo for delivery between 2H March and early April
Description: Angola LNG has issued a tender to sell a cargo for delivery between second-half March and early April from its 5.2 mtpa Soyo LNG export plant. The tender closes on Mar. 1.
Author: CK

Title: China’s Zhoushan to receive LNG cargo from Freeport LNG plant in mid-March
Description: The ENN-operated 5 mtpa Zhoushan LNG terminal in China’s Zhejiang province is scheduled to receive a cargo next month from the newly restarted Freeport LNG plant in the US.
Author: CK
